column4: I've set up apache2, php and mysql (thanks to Seveas) but, do I have to enable <Directory> config for each one in /var/www?
well, so that's weird, cuz I can run testphp.php
but I've installed drupal (/var/www/drupal) and trying to run index.php from drupal just downloads a file (with php code on it)
your going to need to add the .php type to apache
